output:
Okay, I understand!  From now on, I will deliver image descriptions as clear, concise paragraphs under 80 words each, focusing on subject details, lighting and time of day, setting, and the intended mood.  

Just give me your ideas, and let's craft some amazing AI photo prompts together.
complianceText:
The chatbot output does not comply with the description because it exceeds the 80-word limit for a single paragraph as it is divided into two separate paragraphs. Also, it doesn't seem to follow the specific structure of describing subjects and their characteristics, timing and lighting, background, and conveying a feeling, instead it appears to be an introductory message.

ERR
